snippet: The Nasdaq experienced its biggest loss since July as investors prepared for the outcome of a Federal Reserve meeting on Tuesday and Wednesday.
abstract: Investors play it safe ahead of potentially pivotal Federal Reserve meeting, leaving overall stock market little changed.
lead_paragraph: The Nasdaq experienced its biggest loss since July as investors prepared for the outcome of a Federal Reserve meeting on Tuesday and Wednesday.

headline.main: Market Awaits Next Move by the Fed
headline.print_headline: Market Awaits Next Move by the Fed
